name: Kat McSaylor
text: Staff is so polite! The food is amazing! The drinks are great! The artwork is out of this world, and the prices are more than decent! Will definitely be frequenting Mellow Mushroom from now on!!

name: Michael Dees
text: Great service and great food! Beer were priced lower than most other places. Awesome atmosphere!

name: Alistair Kulp
text: Amazing food, drinks, and service! Our waitress was Audrey and they were incredibly charming and funny. Always enjoy mellow mushroom.

name: Robert Stone
text: We were lucky enough to have remembered that MM was on the way home tonight!  We actually got there right at closing time, their hours hadn't updated on google yet, but they let us come in and have pizza at the bar.  The pizza was as ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert S.
text: First time trying this place, and absolutely loved it. The whole overall experience here was great, the only reason it didn‚Äôt get 5 stars was because of the waitress. Kind of seemed like she was just there. I we had to keep asking for ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Bacha
text: Server and pizza was the only good thing from this saddening experience. Soup was cold, returned and got back even less. Mushroom soup looked like a thick single ladle of a pastey gravy. Ordered salad, tomatoes in salad were freezer ‚Ä¶More

name: Kevin Corcoran
text: A lot of times when we go to the cancer center off of Aloma we will stop at the Mellow mushroom for lunch. Today 6 /22/ 2020 and our waiters  name was  Brett, he gave the best service, and remembered  how my wife liked  her chicken  salad ‚Ä¶More

name: Ellen Forrest
text: Always fresh and filling! The beer cheese is a standout. Fast delivery.

name: Cody Stewart
text: The food was great! Attached is the small buffalo chicken pizza - very good! Service was great and the food came out fairly fast. The cookies are very good as well! You can eat inside or outside at this location.

name: D. Allen
text: Best pizza I have had in a long time! Great fast service and good atmosphere in the restaurant. Was my first time, will not be my last!!

name: Kiki Grace
text: I ordered the movie-night package deal and once I picked up the pizza I could the tell the pizzas weren't fresh and had been sitting there for a while. I decided to call them and tell them the pizza was not as good as it usually was. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Sam Weitzner
text: Just left there after a pretty lousy experience. Placed an in person order at the counter. Waited for over an hour while dozens of people came in and out, picking up orders. Nobody asked if I had been helped. Nobody checked on my food, ‚Ä¶More

name: Ricardo Ortolaza
text: Mellow Mushroom is an acquainted place, food is awesome and the staff is friendly,  highly recommended.

name: Donnell Lyons
text: Great Salads, overall great experience the pizza, salad and wings were on point. The waitress and atmosphere was relaxing. Mellow Mushroom I highly recommend!!!

name: John Castillo
text: Decor 70ish 2nd mello mushroom opened in Florida. Waitress was great and genuine . Food was good got a cheese pizza that we couldn't eat we got pretzel bites with mariana sauce and filled up on munchies . Fun place family friendly only ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Severson
text: Kosmic Karma pizza is delicious especially after adding pesto chicken. The crust is almost as good as the rest of the pizza. Beer selection is great. Truly a great place to go

name: Shelby Reynolds
text: Always a good time. Nice staff. Great food. Excellent wine.

name: Dan Demorse
text: I am giving this amazing pizza place 4 stars, but the pizza is 5 star. The moment we walked in they had just had a massive lunch rush and large party so I can understand they were playing catch up a bit but come on , it's a restaurant, you ‚Ä¶More

name: Michelle Hulse
text: Progressively worsening experiences each time we order lately. Either their oven is fried or the cook is bc this last pizza was so burnt, it was practically inedible, but it was take away, so.. wasn‚Äôt much we could do once we got it home but choke it down. Real bummer.

name: Austin Ferguson
text: Too hot outside great place to grab cold one

name: Dante Wilson
text: Pizza was very doughy, wasn‚Äôt a fan of it at all. And the customer service was very poor, I felt ignored during my visit. I think I was greeted one time the whole duration of my meal. I get it it‚Äôs a pizza joint but if you have servers and ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard Severin
text: Tried a vegan pie. My expectations were low, but it was my daughter's birthday - so....   I will not be going VEGAN anytime soon, but it was fairly good.  I may even eat here again with her again.

name: Kimberly R
text: Great place! The portion of mushroom soup was smaller than expected, but worth it. Everything was hot and delicious. Not as expensive as I've heard. Will be back.

name: curtis coaxum
text: First time there and the place was on the money. Audrey was the best server we could have had.  She help us with the right beer pizza and wings. Everything was good and the wings melted in your mouth. The manager was on the floor helping ‚Ä¶More

name: Anonymous Anonymous
text: Food is amazing but Audrey is even better! Great attitude, great food, great service! U can't beat that anywhere else! Thank you!!!! ‚ù§

name: Terry Cravener
text: Awesome,the best pizza I have ever had

name: Scot Frei
text: Quality seems to have fallen off.  Not as great the last couple times.

name: Annie Cascarano
text: Just one word: DELICIOUS! Beautiful place with excellent attention. They are so inclusive, so friendly and the food is so delicious that you can't miss this place. My husband just die for Mellow Mushroom's Pizza. 5 stars! One of our favorite place!

name: Jason Thomas
text: Can't believe it took me so long to eat here.  So good

name: Jennifer Hargis

name: Jason Smith
text: Aubrey was the greatest! And the pizza was to die for

name: Emily Garrett
text: The best pizza, music, and drinksüòç

name: david galat
text: Handled our large party with no issues. Food was good and service also was well done. I love the crust of the pizza and they actually have great salads. Would recommend the chef salad.

name: Belladonna Darkmoon
text: Yummy food, great service, beautiful one of a kind decorations. Honestly love this place.

name: Tracer Bulleit
text: One of the best Pizzas in Orlando. A bit pricey but worth it. Only negative I have to give is about the available parking. Don‚Äôt be surprised if you have to park a little bit away to enjoy the food here. Good decor and friendly wait-staff. Be sure not to miss Mellow Mushroom.

name: Julia Spada
text: The staff at this location are outstanding and they treat you like family! Kim is the best bartender and the food is always on point. No matter who takes care of you, you will be guaranteed great service and a great experience! Favorite place to come for some drinks and pizza after a long day

name: Shaun Oleson
text: Food is always great. For an appetizer, I recommend the pretzel bites with beer cheese. For entrees, you can't do won't with pizza or calzones. If you do pizza, all the server to put two recipes in one pizza (half and half). It's a great way to try a couple variations!!

name: Andrew Laatsch
text: Great pizza and fast service

name: April Adams
text: PIZZA!! How can you  go wrong? Cool beer offerings, great food, excellent service.

name: HungryVegann
text: First and foremost Mellow Mushroom now uses (follow your heart )vegan cheese now instead of Daiya. The pizza now tastes even better than before and with a full menu to please everyone it‚Äôs a great place for outings and family gatherings

name: LUIS JIRAU
text: Excelente pizza. "One of the best".

name: Forest Platt
text: I've reviewed other Mellow Mushroom locals.  This was no different, great service and good food.  Tried the Pacific Rim pizza, it's like a Hawaiian pizza souped up!

name: Caleb m gaming
text: I have been here several times and it never disappoints! I would highly recommend this place if you want really good pizza! We also eat their pretzel bites with the cheese sauce, amazing!!!

name: David Martin Cassese
text: Can't go wrong here.

name: vicki huff
text: The food is great and the staff is terrific. I love the Greek salad. They always have craft beer on tap.

name: Linda Wice
text: Great pizza & they make an awesome red sangria, too!

name: Madison Fischer

text: Great food and beer.

name: Sue Kruze
text: Best calzones ever. Great pizza!

name: Jason Hendricks
text: Don‚Äôt waste your time. Run by stoners and teenagers. Would have liked to rate the pizza but after a 45 minute wait we were told it would be another 15 minutes. We walked. ‚Ä¶More

name: Moe
text: Nice dough, crispy and light. Friendly staff. Variety of beers. Photo is house special.

name: Cheryl Thomas
text: Cool interior. Great music and not too loud. Bruschetta was delicious! Stuffed meatballs were big and flavorful.

name: Luis Villegas
text: Freaking awesome pizza. Ive always loved mellow mushroom but this location is my favorite. Everything is always hot and fresh and the staff is always attentive ‚Ä¶More

text: Fun with friends and family and the Salad was almost as good as the Gluten free pizza for this allergen patron. It can be very hard to find a good gluten free pizza but the salad was also incredible :).

name: John Ferraro
text: Excellent! I am super critical of pizza and this is the best I have had in a long time. The salad was delicious, the appetizer was also delicious. Everyone needs to eat here.

name: Erik Barnes
text: Quality food with funky decor

name: Steven Young
text: Went for a birthday party. We were a large group. Staff was amazing and took amazing care of us! It was nice that they had a gluten free pizza option. My only request, is to get a size option for gluten free pizza. I would have loved to have some leftover to take home.

name: connie brand
text: My favorite  pizza place.  There pizza crust is made with spring water.  One of the few places that have vegan (no dairy) cheese

name: kirk sweet

name: Allen Gatlin
text: Never miss a chance to go here when I'm on that side of town.

name: Radel D.
text: I don't know can't place a finger on what is different... It was good food... Good beer.. Portion seems a little smaller.. Guess the fact i was under the weather is clouding my judgement

name: Dawn Snyder
text: Great food and great service!!

name: Jay Lum Lock
text: The staff here is always on point. Great food every time!

name: jason paris
text: Best management. Best staff. Best Mellow Mushroom location in the state. Food always done right; staff always attentive, friendly, and polite.

name: Mario N
text: I love this place. The staff is always friendly and the food is tastes great.

name: Jade Phoenix
text: Mellow Mushroom is my all time favorite pizza place. They can get a little pricey when you customize them, but it is SO worth it! They have plenty of vegan options. I recommend adding avocado on the side, after the pizza is cooked (they automatically know this is better than cooking the avocado with the pizza).

name: Michael Smith
text: Good food and great service

name: Diana Rodriguez
text: Not a fan of their pizza - too much garlic, but great beer selection!

name: Cathi Cohn
text: Mellow Mushroom is by far one of my favorite pizza places. However, on this last visit we ended up with undercooked and very mediocre pizza. I was so disappointed  :(

name: Katz L

name: Martyn Dennis
text: Always a good thing!

text: I adore Mellow Mushroom! They have vegan cheese and their crust is vegan. I go out of my way to get to Mellow Mushroom whenever I'm travelling close by to one!

name: Nick St. George

name: Andre Phillip

text: We wait 40min to be seated and the pizza is too oily

text: We had a party of 20 and they sat us outside. Not a problem until they shut off the fans. It's middle of summer mellow.

name: Don Kemper
text: Great place for a variety of different pizzas. They have redone their menu some and a favorite of mine was gone (I guess it wasn't a crowd favorite). Anyhow I asked if they could still make a Philosopher's Pie and they said sure with no hesitation and it was a small good as always.

name: Khar
text: Very good vegan pizza but expensive. I typically go elsewhere just due to the cost of the toppings - but the pies are good, the ambiance is nice, the interior is well decorated, and the employees are relatively friendly. If you are vegan ‚Ä¶More

name: Neil Chang
text: The pizza was really good. The crust was perfect though personally I thought my pie was overloaded. Sat on the patio which has a really nice vibe in the evening/night. The hightop table was ridiculously small though; I'd recommend getting a regular table. Service was timely and friendly. All in all a really enjoyable experience.

name: Yvonne Dodson
text: Excellent food, lots of vegan items to choose from and great gluten free crust!

name: Sean Mchugh

text: Staff were super friendly service was quick pizza very good bruschetta was excellent!!

name: Eric Wrigley
text: This place is almost perfect. The pizza is always good and the staff is always on top of things.

name: Ana Santiago
text: Great sevice and the food its great! Love their buffalo chicken pizza

name: German Llodrat
text: Service and food was excellent.

name: Gavin Clark
text: This place has a lot to offer and it has a decent gluten free pizza crust, too. The wings are meaty and tasty, good salads, nice atmosphere. Kids pizzas are gross. Just let them eat some of yours or get a small to share. I never liked French bread pizzas.

name: Joshua Porter
text: Good pizza, service, and atmosphere with cool artwork a bar and televisions

name: Samuel Wallace
text: They was real rude and disrespectful never again for me

name: Cassidy Lindeman
text:
Mellow Mushroom üçÑ is such a chill vibe. Even with my enormous family & all of our ridiculousness it was still an incredibly mellow experience.

name: Wendy Ahern
text: The calzone was great and so was the atmosphere.  Great service

name: alily luzama
text: Great services just my pizza came out cold

name: Sarah Hemler
text: Friendly staff, large amount of seating. The pizza is good, the crust is what makes it different. The pretzel bites are also üòã salads are good too, good spot for that pizza craving!!

text: Yummy crazy pizzas and delish craft beers. Tonight our server was the best ever!

name: Billy Thorton
text: This is twice I've eaten at a mellow mushroom both times the pizza was nowhere near up to par. Drinks are good but on the pricey side. Atmosphere is nice but busy.

name: Susan Furner
text: Love this place. Much more than just pizzas.  All kinds of pizzas, sandwichs...hot, salads and appetizers. The space for parking is limited but opens into the shopping plaza.

name: Anthony Perrone

name: Alexis Ramos
text: Great food. Cant compare their pizza. Its not traditonal at all. Its all different and tasty. Service and atmosphere was pleasant!

name: 4ms.harper
text: Friday night is extremely busy but the service is awesome. So many employees making sure you have been taken care of. The pizza is one of the best in my eyes.

name: David Smith
text: It's Mellow Mushroom! What are you waiting for! Go!

name: Becki Lynn
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE Mellow Mushroom! Only wish it was closer so we could visit more often!

name: Gary Arwin

text: Love the stuffed meatballs.

name: llek01
text: Absolutely amazing. From the service to the food, everything was spot on. We order our vegan food without a problem. Our waitress was very knowledgeable and helpful.

name: carlton britton
text: Favorite Pizza joint. Music was good to

name: Patrick A

name: Jordan Peacock

text:

text: The pizza was amazing! I was able to eat gluten free and still get exactly what I wanted! The texture and flavor of the pizza was definitely a step above everyone else, even as gluten free.

name: Vel Cline
text: The sub is a sandwich.

name: Laure Dee
text: Pizza is really unique and tasty The pretzels are a must have!

name: Senia Moore
text: Great as always

name: Kimberly Evans
text:
WOW... We found this place by accident.  Wonderful food and tje service was fast and friendly.  Gluten free options.

name: Saturn View
text: Always great... Been coming to this location since 2005 and never had a less than great experience. Pizza is delicious and the beer selection always includes great local selections.

name: Richard Wilkins
text: We usually sit outside and the waitress who always takes care of us is super nice, and she even recognizes us! It's nice to be recognized for who we are and to see a familiar face. Love their pizza, every single time I have it!

name: LEE WOOLSON
text: They have great pizzas healthy selection weather vegetarian or mixed with meat or meat only atmosphere is very relaxed servers need to be a little quicker on the feet keep up the great work.

name: jennings ford
text: Best non-standard super quality pizza. Prices are about double chain pizza, but superb ingredients and quality as always.

name: Glenn Doerfler
text: A nice atmosphere. Food is very good. The prices are in line. The  staff  is friendly and very attentive. My family and friends come here about twice a month or so. Parking is difficult at times.

name: Kelli Matheny
text:
Things I enjoy-
Pizza, salads, veggie options, decent craft beer menu, cool vibe and friendly service. ‚Ä¶More

name: Barry Nolan
text: Our server Kyle was super helpful and have great insite on the tastes of the pies. Good came out promptly and hot! Will be back for sure!!

name: Days GN

name: Ralph Proctor
text:
Excellent pizza. We go at least once a month.
Great staff, tio.

name: Cristina Borrero
text: We love this place. It's our favorite! Great food and great service.

name: Kenne Sparks
text: Always great pizza and a great atmosphere for a chat and a beer. Staff is great.

name: Erin Ellis
text: Always good food, but the wait was far too long considering that they knew what time we were coming.

name: Bob Jarvis

name: Linda Townsend
text: Fast service. Delicious gluten free food. We'll be back.

name: Amira Elm
text: Great vegan pizza options--Minus the crust. Tastes and feels like cardboard. Also our server must have gone on regular visits to Jupiter because she was often not seen nearby. Fun atmosphere, though. I could see it getting annoying to some people--but only if you're light sensitive/easily scared by mildly disturbing graffiti.

name: taliah rasul
text: Food is excellent,  staff are wonderful, the patio is amazing,  the decor is interesting

name: Mickel Csaszar

text: Great place for some delicious food. Anytime we are anywhere in the Orlando area we make sure to set aside some time to stop by here. name: david reardon
text: Great service and staff

name: Lucy Hinson
text: Great Food and atmosphere. Staff is great!!!

name: Adekola Omole
text: I got exactly what I asked for. The pizza was hot, pretzel bites and beer cheese were great too. I got a small pizza and was satisfied from first bite to last.

name: Nahir Rosado

name: Patricia Duresky
text: My favorite pizza place, so delicious , staff is friendly and helpful.

name: Katherine Grebe

name: L M
text: I LOVE mellow mushroom. I won‚Äôt go to any other pizza place in WP but mellow mushroom. M.M has made me enjoy the taste of Parmesan. I used to hate parmesan but god I love it. The pretzel balls(or mellow balls) are a must when you come here. ‚Ä¶More

text:
The mushroom soup is very good.

text: Perhaps the best sandwich and pizza I've ever had. The service was quick and the music was great.

name: Daniel Mikuta
text: I enjoy this place. Very chill atmosphere, food is always scrumptious, and the first place I remember that has a wide variety of beers on tap or in a bottle. Check this place out and enjoy!!

text: I love their cheesesteak sandwhich.

name: First Last
text: Neighborhood friendly spot with a gorgeous patio section, lots of hanging plants. Staff is awesome, and menu has veggie friendly options.

name: Heather Gatto
text: Good pizza, a bit on the pricier side but you're paying for fresh dough and veggies.

name: Anna Smith
text: This is the best Mellow Mushroom I have ever been to. Christina waited on us. She was so accommodating and friendly. Great food! Great Service! Great Management!

name: Rosa Restrepo
text: This place is fun and has some really good pizza.  The service was excellent as well.  The place was very busy, but had a nice crowd.  I ordered a pizza to go, because it was that good.  I think I'll be back soon.

name: Carlos & Amity Arocho

name: Arash Keshavarzy
text:
Amazing place
High quality

name: Carrie Moran

name: Erwin Tibayan
text: I love their calzones.

name: Austin Heffernan
text: The staff and the management are extremely friendly. I was reluctant to try the Vegan pizza but it was far better than I thought it would be. This place rocks.

name: Tarsis Paula
text: This pizza is addictive! Love the great white one.

name: Lu Jones
text: Love the environment here! Cozy and good pizza! Recommend!

text: I love the vegan pizza here!!!

name: Natalie Fisher
text: Love this place! Such a cool restaurant ...inside & on patio. Great for larger get-togethers. Staff is always nice, welcoming, and very accommodating if you have specific needs or allergies. Pizza, wings, salads, calzones ...all phenomenal. Enjoy!

name: Nina
text: Picked up take out, the pizza was really good but crust was a bit thick and soft. I'll have to throw it in the oven to crisp it up. I'm used to thin, crispy New Haven/ NYC pizza, which is the best in the world , hands down.,  but this place is probably the best for Orlando. Friendly staff gives it an extra star. Will return.

name: Maurice Milotte
text: Five stars wasn't enough to say how good it was.   The stuffed Portobello Mushroom was to die for .  The half pound burger was excellent.  Magical Mystery Tours pizza was great also.   The best part though was our server Caitlin.   Extremely attentive and a personality to die for.   You can't go wrong here

name: Charlene Perry
text: Poor service,  salad took over 20minto get.
